alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 9:22PM PST until December 24 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern portion of the Grande Ronde Valley near Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds in the northern portion of the Grande Ronde Valley will be lighter 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
